body.p: The undersigned who know James M Chandler to be a peasible and law abiding man request that your Excellency will reconsider the petition of Mr Chandler asking for a remission of a fine of $20 -- imposed on him before Squire Benton in Perryville Boyle County day of Nov 1860. we thing petition contains what is true and merits a more favourable hearing

Ben C. Frapnall
B. F. Patterson
Samuel Vance
S W Jones
E Low (Jailor)
A. A. Silver
G Penny
James C. Westerfield
J M Sillard
Jams May
E gilbert
Geo. Passmore
James. F. Mc,Kee,
James M Petty
T. R. Eversfield
A. F. Cochran
W, H Stillman
I hope the Govenor will reconsider the Petition as the Petitioner is a very poor honest & clever man & send the remission to Perryville if Compatible with his duty

Boyle J. P.
Respite 12 mo
B. M
$20.
J. M Chandler
Issd Jany 15. 1861
